summary: Session 9 complete. Project at 80% health (+4). 111 items shipped / 362 points across 9 sessions. Git clean — all work pushed. 6 issues open (ISS-003, ISS-006, ISS-012, ISS-022, ISS-031, ISS-034). Biggest session yet: 47 files, 7400 lines. Audits tab fully operational. Chat agent reframed as investigation + handoff layer with real-time transparency. ISS-039 (critical: WS remount) fixed — app stability dramatically improved. Entity model expanded with epics, milestones, releases. Automations ON (standard, $10/day). Next: fix ISS-034 (semantic watcher), build view-level data lifecycle (IDEA-067), dogfood on Pillar.
